page.title: 05THE PEOPLE OF MARKS TEY - 4
page.content: {27}work in Colchester , followed by other fairly local places. Both men and women mostly travel by car , a total of{49.5%}.{16.2%}travel on train to their employment.Only{4}men travel by motor_cycle.And{3}women and{1}man travel by bus,{1.8%}.The same total and the same figures, cycle{(1.8%}). Surprisingly only{6}walk to their work. All this information tells us that Marks Tey is a village where people can enjoy the country , and at the same time be able to travel to their employment quickly and cheaply. {WEALTH It seems that the people of Marks Tey are not hard_up ,{97.5%}of our sample own T.V's.{68%}own{1}car and only{15% do not own a motor vechicle . In this advanced age{54%}of our sample own video recorders and{40%}own home_computers.{42}people own{2}cars.
